Text:
Wow, MasterVile, thanks for you know, insulting my religion and culture.  I really appreciate being attacked by people who don't know me and know nothing about me.

Thanks for uploading this though, I look forward to sitting down and watching it.  It looks very interesting!  PBS always does a great job.

Goldar you are very brave from the safety of your keyboard. Why don't you and your skinhead, braindead friends and relatives be so brave f2f. I would love the chance to see how brave you are standing in front of me. I would piss in your mouth and that would be the highlight of the evening. Go try and read Dr. Mengele, I mean Dr. Seuss. PUTZ!

Seeds would be nice.
